Package HCP.Entities

Class Room

java.lang.Object
HCP.Entities.Room
public class Room extends Object
Entity which represents a room where patients can sit in

  • Field Details

    • size

      private final int size
      Number of seats/ size of the room array

    • queue

      public Patient[] queue
      Array of patients in the room

    • count

      private int count
      Count of patients in the room

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(int size)
      Class Constructor

      Queue of seats is initialized with given size value

      Parameters:
      size - : Number of Seats/Size of the room array

  • Method Details

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()

      Checks if the all the seats are occupied by patients

      Returns:
      true if the queue is full, else false

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()

      Checks if the no seats are occupied by patients

      Returns:
      true if the queue is empty, else false

    • add

      public int add(Patient obj)

      Sits a patient in an available seat

      Patient is added to the last position

      Count is increased by 1

      Parameters:
      obj - : new patient to be seated
      Returns:
      0 if is successful, -1 if room is full

    • popById

      public Patient popById(int id)

      Retrieves and removes a Patient from the room given the id

      Count is decreased by 1

      Parameters:
      id - : id of the patient to be removed
      Returns:
      0 if is successful, -1 if room is empty or it does not contain patient with given id value

    • pop

      public Patient pop()

      Retrieves and removes the patient in the first seat

      Count is decreased by 1

      Patients in the posterior seats advance forward

      Returns:
      Patient res: Patient in the first seat, if room is empty return null

    • getFirst

      public Patient getFirst()

      Retrieves but doesn't remove the patient in the first seat

      Returns:
      Patient res: Patient in the first seat, if room is empty return null

    • itemCount

      public int itemCount()

      Retrieves the number of occupied seats in the room

      Returns:
      int count: number of patients in the array

    • minimumId

      public int minimumId()

      Retrieves the minimum id value for all the patients in the room

      Returns:
      int id

    • getMaxDoSMinWtn

      public Patient getMaxDoSMinWtn()

      Retrieves the patient with the maximum priority given its DoS (Degree of Severity, 3 is Max, 1 is minimum)

      If there are patients with the same DoS, retrieve the one with minimum id value

      Returns:
      null if room is empty, else returns the correct patient

    • getComposition

      public int[] getComposition()

      Retrieves the number of patients aged ADULT and number of patients aged CHILD

      Returns:
      int[] results: array with counts, position 0 is CHILD count, 1 is ADULT count

    • contains

      public boolean contains(int id)

      Checks if the room contains a patient with the given id value

      Parameters:
      id - : id of the patient to check
      Returns:
      true if room contains patient with given id, else false

    • addAtIndex

      public int addAtIndex(int i, Patient p)

      Inserts a given patient in a given seat

      Parameters:
      i - : index of the seat
      p - : patient to be seated
      Returns:
      -1 if seat at index is not available, 0 otherwise

    • popByIndex

      public Patient popByIndex(int i)

      Retrieves and removes the patient at a given seat

      Parameters:
      i - : index of the seat
      Returns:
      Patient p: patient at the given index, returns null if seat at index is not available or there's no one at that seat
